original tutorial update double_crochet © 2023 heather noble designs stitch key 2 3 border stitch this is the new version i ve also included the video link for the original version if you prefer that method chart symbol written abbreviation definition bs bs use a border stitch to start and end each row beginning in row 2 *row 1 is the foundation row beginning bs make a standing single_crochet between the legs of the first stitch ending bs make a single_crochet between the legs of the last stitch chain 1 cut yarn border stitch -
